posts.title: What to do if you can't pay rent because of coronavirus, according to a homeless charity

description.text: If you’re worried about paying rent or facing homelessness because of coronavirus, we asked homeless charity Centrepoint to explain what you can do.

posts.title: How to shop online safely with Monzo

description.text: If you're shopping online more during the lockdown, you could be more at risk of falling victim to fraud.

posts.title: Monzo called asking me to move my money into a safe account. Should I?

description.text: Definitely not! We’ve seen an increase in fraudsters claiming to be from Monzo trying to trick people into sending them money by bank transfer. Here’s how to protect yourself.

posts.title: Got a text or email about coronavirus? Here's how to tell if it's real

description.text: Fraudsters are faking government texts, to try and trick you into revealing sensitive information or pay fake fines.

posts.title: Is Monzo safe?

description.text: Lots of you have been going to Google to ask if Monzo’s safe. To help you decide, we’ve explained what we do to protect you and your money when you choose to bank with us.

posts.title: Unexpected message or call from Monzo? Here's how to tell if it's real.

description.text: Your money's safety is our number one priority. Here's how we'll contact you, what we'll ask for, and what we'll never ask you to do.

posts.title: How we upgraded 3D Secure

description.text: We’ve upgraded to the new version of 3D Secure. Backend engineer Arthur explains how we did it.

posts.title: Are pyramid schemes legal in the UK?

description.text: No, pyramid schemes are illegal. People who create them could go to prison, and if you join one you could end up losing hundreds of pounds.

posts.title: Scams to watch out for when you're shopping online this Christmas

description.text: Fradusters are busier than ever over the festive season, so it's especially important to protect your money and keep your eyes open for scams.

posts.title: To protect yourself from fraud, never tell anyone your PIN

description.text: Fraudsters can trick you into sharing your PIN, get access to your bank account and steal your money. Learn how to protect yourself from phishing scams.

posts.title: Protecting customers from the Ticketmaster breach: Monzo's story

description.text: Last night, Ticketmaster revealed a major data breach in which tens of thousands of people had their card details stolen. Our customers have nothing to worry about.

posts.title: How to protect yourself against APP fraud

description.text: Authorised push payment (APP) fraud is where someone tricks you into sending them money from your bank account. Here are some tips how to avoid being a victim.

posts.title: Why we sometimes freeze or block Monzo accounts

description.text: All banks are legally required to block accounts sometimes. But it can be difficult if you know you've done nothing wrong. We explain why this (very rarely) happens, and what you can do if it does.

posts.title: Protect yourself against investment scams on social media

description.text: An investment opportunity promising you amazing returns in days? It’s probably a scam.

posts.title: My bank says I need to move my money into a 'safe account' – should I?

description.text: No – this is a kind of fraud where someone tricks you into sending them money, usually by pretending to be from a company you trust.

posts.title: The British Airways data breach: How Monzo responded

description.text: Last night British Airways announced that the personal and financial details of their customers had been stolen. We identified the 1,300 Monzo customers who’ve been affected, and ordered them replacement cards as a precaution.

posts.title: Live updates: Monzo customers and the Marriott group data breach

description.text: The Marriott hotel group just announced that more than 500 million customers of its Starwood hotels have been affected by a data breach.

posts.title: We’re seeing more pyramid schemes on social media. Here’s how to protect yourself.

description.text: More people are falling victim to pyramid schemes on social media. Here’s how you can protect yourself against this increasingly common kind of fraud.

posts.title: Icelandic airline WOW Air has gone bust. Have you been affected?

description.text: Iceland's WOW Air announced that it’s stopped operating and cancelled all future flights. Here's what to do if you're a Monzo customer that's been affected.

posts.title: How to protect your money from authorised push payment fraud

description.text: Do you really know who you’re sending money to? Find out how to avoid authorised push payment fraud and what we’re doing to protect you.

posts.title: What to do if you can't pay rent because of coronavirus, according to a homeless charity

description.text: If you’re worried about paying rent or facing homelessness because of coronavirus, we asked homeless charity Centrepoint to explain what you can do.
